safeSplit(String) - Static method in class ws2d.util.Utils
Splits a string by spaces while keeping quotes in mind.
Scheduler - Class in ws2d.core.server
This class keeps track of timed tasks for the server.

Server - Class in ws2d.core.server
The main class of Ws2D besides the API class ws2d.init.Ws2D, and the launcher class ws2d.main.Main.
